description: This file defines the main React component for the frontend UI of the game platform, managing user login, game selection, and rendering different game components with navigation and theme toggling.

methods.name: RootApp()
methods.description: Main component that initializes user context and starts the root flow for login, selection, and game display.

methods.name: RootFlow()
methods.description: Handles internal state for view (login, select, game), manages theme toggling, and renders appropriate components based on current state.

methods.name: onLogin
methods.description: Callback invoked upon user login, sets username and transitions to game selection.

methods.name: onSelectGame
methods.description: Sets the active game tab based on user selection and transitions to game view.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Logs out the user and returns to login view.
